description: Trevor Long is sick and recovering in bed when Nate Grimes arrives with some soup. Nate can’t help but pull Trevor’s cock out while he’s in bed; with his eyes covered by a cloth, Trevor thinks his girlfriend has arrived in a kinky mood. His hard dick in a warm mouth feels so good, he keeps Nate around after the initial shock to finish the job he started.
title: Chicken Soup For The Cock
